Entries.default: The completed circuit thrums with the flow of souls. You sense strong feelings of joy, despair, and everything in between resonating from the adra as the essence streams through it.

As you enter the flow, the sensations become almost auditory, cries of relief, tears of happiness, screams of agony, all echo at the edges of your senses. They melt together into an incoherent chaos that rushes past your ears as you're swept against the current by the gravity of your physical form.
[Use the Tooth of Toamowhai to again cut the Crucible off from the Beyond.]
You slam into your body as if falling from a great height. You wake with an involuntary gasp, to find Engari looking down at you.

Your spirit turns the power of the Tooth of Toamowhai back on the path you've just come from, and you choke it closed, once again closing the way from the Here to the Beyond. 

Kazuwari will again be as you found it.
